The body itself always needs calories (energy) to survive and move. Without energy, the cells in the body will die, the organs cannot maintain the basic process to ensure life. Human calories are absorbed daily through drinks and food. If provided enough one lCalorie intake needed every day The body will function normally healthy. In contrast, providing too much or too few calories will cause health problems.

The amount of calories needed for the body Each person's is different. On the other hand, the rate of consumption and energy metabolism in each person is not the same, that is not to mention the lifestyle in some people who tend to be more active than others. People who need to gain weight need to ensure that the amount of calories absorbed must be more than the calories consumed. Otherwise, For those who need to lose weight, more energy is needed than consumption and this job needs to proceed regularly over a certain period of time. When adding calories to the body, we also need to remember to prioritize calories from fiber and protein.
